about.heading: I'm Paige, and I'm a front-end web developer based out of Toronto!
about.content: Taking advantage of my background in Object Oriented Programming I’ve been taking the time to cultivate my skills in front-end development to round out my expertise as a web developer. With a passion for clean and concise code I prioritize usability and accessibility in my applications. When not working and honing my ever-growing list of skills in web development you can find me playing games, working on music, or spending time with my dog Zelda.

project1.content: The experience of walking through a movie hallway and taking time to view all the posters brought to life in a digital format. Take a nostalgic trip through decades past of movie releases and find your next movie to watch.
project1.title: Theater Experience

project2.content: Collaborative client design driven prototype for a navigable podcatcher. Find podcasts based on topic and listening length and build your own podcast playlists catered to your interests!
project2.title: Podcast Planner

project3.content: Paired programming collaborative prototype with Sarah Duong. Using the Pokémon API to provide a tool for players to find information on their favourite Pokémon and their corresponding Pokédex entry!
project3.stack: jQuery | JavaScript | RESTful API | SASS | HTML5
project3.title: Pokémon Generator
